subject: Trouble with my Ant build integration
msgSnippet: Iam intergrating my test classes into the ant build using netbeans as my IDE. Iam using the junit tag command and i am getting an error that is this. THis is
messageBody:
Iam intergrating my test classes into the ant build using netbeans as
my IDE. Iam using the junit tag command and i am getting an error
that is this. THis is sent to the report dir. I created.

Caused an ERROR
Will not load classes from default package
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Will not load classes from default
package
at org.netbeans.ProxyClassLoader.loadClass
(ProxyClassLoader.java:142)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:235)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:235)
at org.netbeans.core.execution.RunClassThread.run
(RunClassThread.java:118)

A sample of the ant build is this
<junit fork="no" haltonerror="no" haltonfailure="no"
printsummary="yes" showoutput="true">
<classpath refid="test.classpath"/>
<formatter type="brief"/>
<formatter type="plain"/>
<test name="ListImplTest" todir="${test.reports.dir} "/>
<test name="ReaderTest" todir="${test.reports.dir} "/>


Please email me or post a solution (Hopefully)
